Control Statement: Paired regions exist within the same geography and provide native replication features for recovery purposes, such as Geo-Redundant Storage (GRS) asynchronous replication. In the event of planned maintenance, updates to a region will be performed sequentially only.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.1 What design considerations have you made for performance efficiency in your workload?
control_attributes.Description: Paired regions exist within the same geography and provide native replication features for recovery purposes, such as Geo-Redundant Storage (GRS) asynchronous replication. In the event of planned maintenance, updates to a region will be performed sequentially only.
